BR_text.BRsummary: Missing network assignment when loading models from memory
BR_text.BRdescription:
Describe the bug
 FAST client application terminates without no message
 
 
 
 FAST/source/FAST/Algorithms/NeuralNetwork/InferenceEngines/OpenVINOEngine.cpp
 
 
          Line 61
       in
       9d26761
 
 
 
 
 
 
  m_inferenceCore->ReadNetwork(strModel, make_shared_blob<uint8_t>({Precision::U8, {m_weights.size()}, C}, m_weights.data())); 
 
 
 
 
 
 new line should be:
 network = m_inferenceCore->ReadNetwork(strModel, make_shared_blob<uint8_t>({Precision::U8, {m_weights.size()}, C}, m_weights.data()));

comments_0.comment_text: Fixed and pushed to master. Thanks
